plot: This powerful film about the Jewish Defense League traces the militant group's history from the streets of Brooklyn where it originated to the Occupied Territories where it flourishes today...
title: Never Again, Forever
plot_es: This powerful film about the Jewish Defense League traces the militant group's history from the streets of Brooklyn where it originated to the Occupied Territories where it flourishes today...
